works.description:
REAL MEN DON'T HIT WOMEN is my
copyrighted  
work. It is on T-shirts, posters, etc. The infringed work is identified  
below, on a site that Google hosts. It is also on the Google search engine
 
- Real Men Don't Hit Women. I am requesting the immediate removal, from  
both, Google's search engine, and the blogspot.com site that is provided  

below. I also request cease and desist from further infringement of my  
work, on the Google search engine, blogspot.com, and any other  
Google-affiliated sites. The words on the poster is an infringement of my 

creation - REAL MEN DON'T HIT WOMEN.

**If Google, does not remove, cease, and desist, I am entitled to use your
 
failure to comply as "willful infringement," and I will take legal action 

against Google.

**AGAIN, please ensure that the photo with my words are removed from the  

Google search engine and the blogspot.com site.

Sincerely,
Michelle Cole
info@MichelleCole.org
